name: ReindeerRacing
0:
”Alexa open reindeer racing”
”Alexa play reindeer racing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reindeer racing
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

Get ready for a holly, jolly Christmas adventure with Reindeer Racing! Join Santa Claus and starting racing with his trusty reindeer in this exciting festive game.

Choose one of Santa's reindeer as your racing companion! Will it be Dasher, Dancer, Prancer, Vixen, Comet, Cupid, or Donner? Pick your favorite and get ready to dash through the snow in a thrilling race to victory!

Reindeer Racing is anyones game. Sometimes it's luck of the draw, and sometimes mischievous Christmas Yeti may appear on the track and lead your reindeer astray!

If you win, you'll earn crunchy Christmas carrots. These delectable treats are the ultimate prize for triumphant racers. Earn as many Christmas carrots as you can to climb the leaderboard and solidify your position as the top reindeer racer in the land.

Listen out for Santa's very own song “The Reindeer Pull My Sleigh”, which is played if you win the race.

Reindeer Racing is supported on all Alexa enabled devices, with visual effects and animations for Echo Show devices, as well as immersive sound for devices without a screen.

This skill is part of Mini Games.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
